script:
1). Some people say almost with pride that they have never read a book.
I need a really good plot to keep me reading a book to the end.
Well, if it were me, I would keep quiet about it. 
I usually read at least six books every month.
2). Can I borrow that book after you've finished with it?
The trouble is that if you lend a book to someone, you can't be sure you'll get it back.
I borrowed a book once over 20 years ago and never gave it back.
Of course you can but don't spill coffee all over it. 
3). There's a saying isn't there, that you should never judge a book by its cover?
They try so hard nowadays by putting sexy pictures on a book cover to make you buy it.
He always reads certain books with a plain cover so that no one knows what it's about.
You can say the same thing about people can't you, as sometimes people are quite different from the way they look.
